sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_17

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_17

sentences.sentence: The Neman River separates Lithuania from the Kaliningrad region, an enclave of the Russian Federation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Geopolitical tensions fueled by Russia's war in Ukraine have forced Lithuania to strengthen its border controls.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: This bridge, which is the state border, is closed to car traffic.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Some Lithuanians have cut themselves off from their Russian neighbors.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: But others continue to take this route, now on foot.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The potential for Russian provocation during the NATO summit taking place in the capital Vilnius means the state borders are even more heavily guarded.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_18
sentences.sentence: We raised our border surveillance up to the maximum level.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_18
sentences.sentence: In fact, we have introduced a number of measures at the border, starting from the deployment of additional staff, also introducing technical system cooperation with our partners at the national level, as well as internationally.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The EU's nature restoration law survives a dramatic vote in the European Parliament, even if by a razor-thin margin.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: And it is adopted.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The result was approved with 336 votes in favor, 300 against and 13 abstentions, and was celebrated by progressive lawmakers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: This law is good even for those who have voted against it.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: So I hope you can be happy after this vote.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: And I want to especially thank the scientists and the young people, because they are the ones who have shown and convinced us that we had to have this law, the young people because they have shown and convinced us that we had to have this law and we are going to have it.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Right wing groups fiercely opposed the bill and had tried to kill it saying that it could put at risk the survival of European farmers and fishermen.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Environmentalists on the other side came out in full force though, fighting for what they say will restore the EU.U.'s degraded ecosystems.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The result is a lifeline for Europe's climate ambitions, which in recent months have become a target of sustained attack from the right as E.U. elections approach in June next year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The bill will now go back to the European Parliament's Environment Committee.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_16
sentences.sentence: Czech-born writer Milan Kundera has died at the age of 94.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_16
sentences.sentence: He was born in 1929 in then Czechoslovakia, but considered himself a French writer.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_16
sentences.sentence: He wrote ten novels, three poetry collections, a short story collection and many essays.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_16
sentences.sentence: His literary works are known for their deep philosophical themes, political illusions and heart-rending plots. Kundera's most famous work, The Unbearable Lightness of Being, was adapted into a film in 1988. He settled in France in 1979 after being excluded from the Czechoslovakian Communist Party. He received French citizenship in 1981.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_16
sentences.sentence: He received French citizenship in 1981.

sentences.sentence: Since 1997 in Sarajevo, the Roads of Friendship project has been closely intertwined with the Ravenna Festival, bringing a message of peace and unity between cultures through the work of the renowned conductor Riccardo Mutti.
